caption: The image features a person holding a cell phone with a pink case. The phone is being used to take a picture, capturing a moment in time. The image is a representation of a World Social Media Day, with the focus on the importance of being cautious of what we read and watch on social media. The image is a reminder to be aware of the content we consume and the impact it may have on our lives.
original_title: Blue Colorful World Social Media Day Poster
texts:
be carefull of what you read
and watch on social media
